name: Sonic (PC Port) All Versions
description:
Original Version: The Very First Version Of The Game That Was Made For The Creepypasta Challenge. This One Is Very Glitchy

Remake: The Second Version Made Of This Game. This One Fixed Lots Of Bugs And Glitches From The Original And Changed Various Sprites And Elements From The First Version

Last Demo: This One Was A Troll Made By The Developers Due To A Conflict That They Had With A Member Of Their Team That Almost Got The Game Cancel

Original Game By Joey Dev Boy/ JoeDoughBoi/ Average Joe

Remake By John-kun

Creepypasta By JC The Hyena And Shannon Love

Original Game's Page ( WayBack Machine):http://web.archive.org/web/20201010214633if_/https://gamejolt.com/games/the_fire...
